import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    A,B = line.split()
    A = int(A)
    B = int(B)
    print((A+B)%24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    A, B = line.split()
    A = int(A)
    B = int(B)
    print((A + B) % 24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
import sys

def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print((a + b) % 24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    a,b = line.split()
    a = int(a)
    b = int(b)
    print((a+b)%24) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
